# Issue Template: Direct Issue

This document describes the direct issue template located at `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/direct_issue.md`.

## Purpose

- Track work raised outside PR review flow.
- Provide a consistent format for standalone issues.
- Keep issue content actionable and verifiable.

## Source File

- `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/direct_issue.md`

## Expected Content

- Context describing why the issue exists
- Problem statement
- Acceptance criteria (verifiable)
- Optional references to related issues and PRs

## Naming and Labels

- Title follows the configured pattern in the template front matter.
- Labels are managed from template metadata and repository label conventions.
